General.Name: Nanjing Vishee Medical Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Vishee Medical Technology Co., Ltd engages in the research, development, production, and sale of medical devices in China. The company offers medical equipment, including magnetic stimulators, biostimulus feedback instruments and products, and neonatal EEG measuring instruments; medical consumables, such as disposable sterile vaginal electrodes, vaginal electrodes, rectal electrodes, pelvic floor muscle rehabilitation devices, and body surface electrodes for physiotherapy; non-medical equipment comprising pulse magnetic, pelvic, and postpartum recovery instruments; and disposable and dedicated pelvic floor training probes, as well as other probes for pelvic floor training. It serves pelvic floor and postpartum, mental psychology, neurological rehabilitation, and sports rehabilitation fields. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanjing, China.
